subject: Bahasa Inggris
title: Latihan Soal SAS Ganjil Bahasa Inggris Kelas 5
subtitle: Paket 50 soal lengkap mencakup materi Taste, Quantifiers, Prices, Health, dan Clothes sesuai kisi-kisi SDIT Al-Mumtaz.

questions.text:
A: 'How does the honey taste?'
B: 'It tastes ...'
questions.desc: Indikator 1: Melengkapi dialog tentang rasa. Madu (honey) rasanya manis (sweet).

questions.text: Look at the picture of a lemon. The taste of the fruit is...
questions.desc: Indikator 2: Menentukan rasa dari gambar makanan. Lemon rasanya asam (sour).

questions.text: I am a fruit. My skin is red and hairy. My flesh is white. I taste sweet. I am a...
questions.desc: Indikator 3: Menentukan buah berdasarkan kalimat tentang rasa dan ciri fisik.

questions.text: Which pair is correct based on the taste?
questions.desc: Indikator 4: Pasangan makanan dan rasa yang tepat. Ice cream rasanya manis.

questions.text: Which statement is TRUE about the taste?
questions.desc: Indikator 5: Pernyataan yang benar sesuai fakta rasa. Garam rasanya asin (salty).

questions.text:
Arrange the words: bitter - is - The - coffee.
The correct order is...
questions.desc: Indikator 6: Menyusun kata acak menjadi kalimat (Subject + To Be + Adjective).

questions.text: Look at the picture! The boy is eating chili. He feels...
questions.desc: Indikator 7: Menentukan rasa sesuai gambar aktivitas (makan cabai = pedas).

questions.text: Read the text: 'Budi likes chocolate and candies.' It means Budi likes ... food.
questions.desc: Indikator 8: Menentukan rasa yang disukai tokoh dalam teks.

questions.text: The Indonesian meaning of 'Bitter' is...
questions.desc: Indikator 9: Arti kata dari rasa makanan (Bitter = Pahit).

questions.text:
Seller: 'What do you want to buy?'
Buyer: 'I want to buy ... of spinach.'
questions.desc: Indikator 10: Melengkapi percakapan jual beli. Bayam satuannya 'a bunch' (seikat).

questions.text: Look at the picture (Gambar segelas susu). It is...
questions.desc: Indikator 11: Menentukan satuan (quantifier) minuman dari gambar.

questions.text: Look at the picture (Gambar sepiring nasi goreng). Is it a bowl of noodle?
options: No, it is not. It is a plate of fried rice
No, it is a bowl of soup
questions.desc: Indikator 12: Menentukan respon Yes/No berdasarkan gambar.

questions.text: Which picture matches the phrase 'A hand of bananas'?
questions.desc: Indikator 13: Menentukan gambar sesuai pernyataan 'Expression of Quantity'.

questions.text: The English translation for 'Sepotong kue' is...
questions.desc: Indikator 14: Menerjemahkan istilah kuantitas ke Bahasa Inggris.

questions.text: Which pair is correct?
questions.desc: Indikator 15: Menentukan pasangan makanan dan satuannya (Chocolate - Bar).

questions.text:
A: 'I am thirsty. Can you give me ... of water?'
B: 'Sure.'
questions.desc: Indikator 16: Melengkapi percakapan 'asking for help' dengan quantity yang tepat.

questions.text: Look at the picture! Joshua is eating ... of noodle.
questions.desc: Indikator 17: Menentukan kalimat sesuai gambar aktivitas makan (Mie di mangkok = bowl).

questions.text:
Arrange the words: drink - a - of - coke - can.
The correct sentence is...
questions.desc: Indikator 18: Menyusun kata acak tentang expression of quantity.

questions.text: Look at the money (Gambar uang Rp 50.000). The amount is...
questions.desc: Indikator 19: Menentukan jumlah uang (50.000 = Fifty thousand).

questions.text: Look at the bag. The price tag says 'Rp 75.000'. The bag costs...
options: Seven thousand and five hundred rupiahs
questions.desc: Indikator 20: Menentukan harga benda berdasarkan gambar.

questions.text:
Menu:
- Bakso: Rp 12.000
- Mie Ayam: Rp 10.000
How much is the Mie Ayam?
questions.desc: Indikator 21: Menemukan harga makanan dalam tabel menu.

questions.text:
Menu:
- Burger: Rp 25.000
- Fries: Rp 15.000
- Tea: Rp 5.000
Which item is the cheapest (paling murah)?
questions.desc: Indikator 22: Menentukan item termurah/termahal dari menu.

questions.text: Look at the menu in No. 22. Is the Burger fifteen thousand rupiahs?
options: No, it is not. It is twenty five thousand
questions.desc: Indikator 23: Merespon pertanyaan Yes/No tentang harga.

questions.text: You buy a Burger (Rp 25.000) and a Tea (Rp 5.000). How much is the total?
questions.desc: Indikator 24: Menghitung total pembayaran (25k + 5k = 30k).

questions.text: The total price is Rp 45.000. You pay with Rp 50.000. How much is the change (kembalian)?
questions.desc: Indikator 25: Menghitung kembalian (50k - 45k = 5k).

questions.text: Look at the shoes with the label 'Rp 150.000'. The sentence is...
options: The shoes are one hundred and fifty thousand rupiahs
The shoes are fifty thousand rupiahs
The shoes are one hundred rupiahs
The shoes are fifteen thousand rupiahs
questions.desc: Indikator 26: Membuat kalimat sesuai gambar benda dan label harga.

questions.text: Look at the picture! The boy is holding his stomach. He has a...
questions.desc: Indikator 27: Menentukan gangguan kesehatan dari gambar (Sakit perut).

questions.text: Look at the picture (Sakit Gigi). The correct sentence is...
questions.desc: Indikator 28: Menentukan kalimat sesuai gambar gangguan kesehatan.

questions.text:
A: 'I have a terrible cough.'
B: 'You should drink ...'
questions.desc: Indikator 29: Merespon keluhan penyakit dengan saran yang tepat.

questions.text: Eating too many candies can cause...
questions.desc: Indikator 30: Menentukan akibat dari aktivitas (Makan permen -> Sakit gigi).

questions.text: The cause of 'Stomachache' is usually...
questions.desc: Indikator 31: Menentukan penyebab gangguan kesehatan (Pedas -> Sakit perut).

questions.text:
Read the dialog:
Ani: 'Why is Budi absent?'
Siti: 'He has a fever.'
Who is sick?
questions.desc: Indikator 32: Menentukan tokoh yang sakit dalam percakapan.

questions.text: Why does he have a toothache?
options: Because he brushes his teeth everyday
Because he rarely brushes his teeth and eats sweets
questions.desc: Indikator 33: Menentukan alasan seseorang sakit.

questions.text:
Text: 'Sinta has a headache.'
Question: What does Sinta feel?
questions.desc: Indikator 34: Menjawab pertanyaan 'What' berdasarkan teks penyakit.

questions.text: If you have a cold, you should not...
options: Drink ice and play in the rain
questions.desc: Indikator 35: Menentukan pernyataan saran (larangan) yang sesuai teks.

questions.text:
Look at the list:
1. Shoes
2. Shirt
3. Shorts
The correct order from top to bottom of the body is...
questions.desc: Indikator 36: Menyusun urutan pakaian/gambar (Kemeja -> Celana -> Sepatu).

questions.text:
Arrange the words: wearing - is - Aisyah - a - veil.
The correct sentence is...
questions.desc: Indikator 37: Menyusun kata acak tentang aktivitas berpakaian.

questions.text: Look at the picture of a boy wearing a T-shirt. Is he wearing a jacket?
questions.desc: Indikator 38: Merespon pertanyaan Yes/No tentang pakaian tokoh.

questions.text: Look at the picture of a girl wearing a dress. What is she wearing?
questions.desc: Indikator 39: Menentukan jenis pakaian yang digunakan tokoh.

questions.text: Made is going to play football. He wears a jersey and...
questions.desc: Indikator 40: Menentukan pakaian yang sesuai dengan kegiatan/tokoh.

questions.text: We wear a tie (dasi) on our...
questions.desc: Indikator 41: Menentukan anggota tubuh yang memakai benda tersebut.

questions.text: It is a kind of clothes for sleeping. It is a...
questions.desc: Indikator 42: Menentukan jenis pakaian berdasarkan gambar/deskripsi.

questions.text: We usually wear a ... when it is raining.
questions.desc: Indikator 43: Melengkapi kalimat tentang fungsi pakaian.

questions.text: Which pair is correct?
questions.desc: Indikator 44: Menjodohkan jenis pakaian dan tempat/kegiatannya.

questions.text: In Islam, good clothing must...
questions.desc: Indikator 45: Menentukan cara berpakaian yang baik dalam Islam.

questions.text: Look at the picture of a candy. The sentence is: 'The candy tastes ...'
questions.desc: Indikator 46 (Adaptasi Esai): Melengkapi kalimat rasa sesuai gambar.

questions.text: I am hungry. I want to...
questions.desc: Indikator 47 (Adaptasi Esai): Melengkapi kalimat tentang perasaan dan keinginan (Need/Want).

questions.text: Menu: Rice (5k) + Chicken (10k) + Water (3k). The total is...
questions.desc: Indikator 48 (Adaptasi Esai): Menuliskan total pesanan.

questions.text: Why does he have a stomachache? Because he...
questions.desc: Indikator 49 (Adaptasi Esai): Menjawab pertanyaan 'Why' tentang penyakit.

questions.text: These are clothes for the head, EXCEPT (Kecuali)...
questions.desc: Indikator 50 (Adaptasi Esai): Mengelompokkan jenis pakaian berdasarkan anggota tubuh.
